attributes.action: STOP THE BAN ON XL BULLYS IN SCOTLAND
attributes.additional_details: Dogs are trained by owners, therefore owners are held responsible for their dogs actions, RETHINK THE BAN!!!
attributes.background: Review their potential ban of the xl bully breed in Scotland, consider stricter sentencing on back door breeders and dangerous dog OWNERS, why should dogs die and be banned because of bad breeders and owners!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about banning XL Bully dogs in Scotland are a matter for the Scottish Government and Parliament, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
